For those with blackBox, you need to go to regedit,

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREUbisoftFarcry 3, make sure the InstallDir is correct, Version number is correct, then go to

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESoftwareWow6432NodeMicrosoftWindowsCurrentVersionUninstall

Create a new key in this folder named {E3B9C5A9-BD7A-4B56-B754-FAEA7DD6FA88} Exactly like that. Then in the new key you created, make a new string named DisplayVersion, and set its value to whatever version of game you have.(1.00 or 1.01) That should do the trick.
